Text: whats up with speed man, im stuck at 37% all day

Install Setup.exe.  Crack is preinstalled, launch the game from  the shortcut and when serial number window pops up use ANY serial number you'd like and click OK (if you only click OK it will ask again next launch).

NOTE:  Multiplayer CO-OP works ONLY with direct IP connection.  Play on Public servers will not work unless you purchase the game.
Zones.cfg can be modified to show your server in game and other cracked servers, just make sure people use your Zones.cfg or direct IP to connect.

The future looks rosy for Indie game Developers. Space Pirates And Zombies And Drox Operative are the best games in the market right now.

Have been at 99.02% for three hours now.

Started this when I got home from work at 2pm yesterday. 1pm the next day and it's still only at 51%. For a 150mb file. Just insane. Downloaded this an hour after it was uploaded... uploader has never actually been on to seed.

Currenly I am living in a part of the world where there is no fibre optic  internet connection. I was going to upgrade from 256kbps to  2mbps but the guys were sold out of broadband modems.

Please bear with me. I will soon upgrade my internet by end of January.

As long as we don't have to wait until then to get that ~1%...

Seriously though, thanks for the dl.
